page.title: 13MATCHSTICK MODELLING
page.content: Matchstick modelling is the hobby of 70 year old Mr.Fred Draper of Sherburn village just outside Durham City.Master modeller Fred,is nearing completion of his current project which is a model of Durham Cathedral. Started in 1980,it is due to be completed in 1986.The finished model will be 2 metres long and over 1 metre high.The model is in 3 parts for ease of transport and it is hoped that when it is finished it will displayed in the monks dormitory at the Cathedral.As he is housebound the model is being constructed from sketches,photographs and his memory.He has also made a working model of stephenson's Rocket.
